The 2008 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2008 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2008) was held on 1 July 2008, at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Lázaro Ramos hosted the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
Nominees were announced on 22 April 2008. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
